resources.string: Google Fit lets you control your fitness data from multiple apps and devices.
By connecting Google Fit and Fitness Explorer, you will be able to view the information in an easy to read way.
No Google Fit data found. Please start using Google Fit.

By default Fitness Explorer displays fake fitness data in order to showcase GrapeCity controls. In order to link Fitness Explorer with your GoogleFit data simply click the GoogleFit icon in the top right hand corner.
